entry.title: WIND WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:54 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 02:20 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17 except minus 12 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 17 except minus 12 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
